method.name: subscribe

param.name: objHandler
param.text: if an object, the instance to notify of events (objFunction is required); if a string, the JSX id of the instance to notify of events (objFunction is required), must exist in the same Server; if a function, the function to call to notify of events (objFunction ignored)

param.name: objFunction
param.text: if objHandler is a string or object then the function to call on that instance. either a function or a string that is the name of a method of the instance

method.text: Subscribes an event handler to events of type strEventId that bubble all the way up to the browser window.

method.name: unsubscribe
method.text: Unsubscribes an event handler from events of type strEventId that bubble all the way up to the browser window.

method.name: unsubscribeAll
method.text: Unsubscribes all event handlers from a events of type strEventId that bubble all the way up to the browser window.

method.name: getType
method.text: Returns the type of event, e.g. mousedown, click, etc.

method.name: srcElement
method.text: Returns handle to the HTML element acted upon (click, mousedown, etc).

method.name: toElement
method.text: Returns handle to the HTML element that was moused over (onmouseover).

method.name: fromElement
method.text: Returns handle to the HTML element that was moused away from (onmouseout).

method.name: keyCode
method.text: Returns integer representing the key code of the key just pressed/keyed-down.

method.name: clientX
method.text: Returns the clientX property for the event (where it occurred on-screen).

method.name: clientY
method.text: Returns the clientY property for the event (where it occurred on-screen).

method.name: getTrueX
method.text: Returns the actual position in the browser from the left edge for where the event occurred.

method.name: getTrueY
method.text: Returns the actual position in the browser from the top edge for where the event occurred.

method.name: shiftKey
method.text: Returns true if the shift key was pressed.

method.name: ctrlKey
method.text: Returns true the ctrl key was pressed.

method.name: altKey
method.text: Returns true if the alt key was pressed.

method.name: enterKey
method.text: Returns true if the enter key was pressed.

method.name: spaceKey
method.text: Returns true if the space bar was pressed.

method.name: tabKey
method.text: Returns true if the tab key was pressed.

method.name: rightArrow
method.text: Returns true if the right-arrow key was pressed

method.name: leftArrow
method.text: Returns true if the left-arrow key was pressed.

method.name: upArrow
method.text: Returns true if the up-arrow key was pressed.

method.name: downArrow
method.text: Returns true if the down-arrow key was pressed.

method.name: deleteKey
method.text: Returns true if the delete key was pressed.

method.name: backspaceKey
method.text: Returns true if the backspace key was pressed.

method.name: insertKey
method.text: Returns true if the insert key was pressed.

method.name: homeKey
method.text: Returns true if the home key was pressed.

method.name: endKey
method.text: Returns true if the end key was pressed.

method.name: pageUpKey
method.text: Returns true if the page-up key was pressed.

method.name: pageDownKey
method.text: Returns true if the page-down key was pressed.

method.name: escapeKey
method.text: Returns true if the escape key was pressed.

method.name: exists
method.text: Returns true if the native event object is present (if an event of any type actualy occurred).

method.name: cancelBubble
method.text: Cancels event bubbling for the event.

method.name: cancelReturn
method.text: Cancels the return value for the event.

method.name: cancelKey
method.text: Cancels the key from firing by setting the keyCode to 0 (zero) for the event.

method.name: leftButton
method.text: Returns true if the left-mouse-button was clicked.

method.name: rightButton
method.text: Returns true if the right-mouse-button was clicked.

method.name: button
method.text: Returns integer designating the mouse button clicked/moused-down/moused-up; 1 (left), 2 (right), and as supported.

method.name: setReturn

param.name: strReturn
param.text: string message to set on the returnValue for the event

method.text: Sets the the return value for the event.

method.name: isArrowKey
method.text: Whether one of the four arrow keys was pressed.

method.name: isFunctionKey
method.text: Whether one of the 15 function keys was pressed.
